summary: REQ-1 is partially addressed: the `/posters` route and nav link appear removed, but the Posters page file still exists in the frontend tree per the diff summary. REQ-2 (publish/redeploy failure) is not evidenced as resolved by the diff summary. Several changes (NotFound page and backend poster/profile authorization/logic changes) appear not explicitly requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the Posters page implementation so it is no longer part of the frontend build (delete/remove Posters page completely).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows `frontend/src/pages/PosterPage.tsx` still present (not removed). While the route/nav link were removed, the requirement calls for removing the page implementation so it is no longer part of the frontend build.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/PosterPage.tsx (still present in diff summary; no removed files listed)

missing_requirements.requirement: Resolve the publish/republish failure so a publish/redeploy run completes successfully without the platform error message and the deployed app works.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence directly addresses publish/redeploy pipeline/configuration issues or the specific platform error; only application code changes are shown, and success of publish cannot be confirmed from the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a custom NotFound page and configured TanStack Router `notFoundComponent`.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove Posters page and fix publish failure; adding a new NotFound component/route handler is not requested and could be considered a new feature.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified backend poster/profile logic and authorization checks (uploadPoster/getPosters/profile methods) including limiting stored posters.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states not to change poster/profile backend APIs or data model unless required to fix publish failure; the diff shows substantive backend logic changes without any explicit linkage to the publish failure in the provided diff summary.
evidence: backend/main.mo (significant changes: poster storage logic, permission checks, traps, poster limiting)

hallucinated_features.description: Removed poster-related operations from `useQueries` and kept only user-profile hooks.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 focuses on removing the Posters page route/nav/implementation; refactoring query hooks is not explicitly requested (though it may be cleanup).
evidence: frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts ("with all poster-related operations removed" per diff content)
